abstracts.cdata!:
The principal objective of the
            Agricultural Technical Assistance Project will be to support
            the Government's structural adjustment program in the
            agricultural sector by providing technical assistance to
            address key issues affecting performance. Specifically, the
            Project will comprise the following components: (a) Grain
            Pricing and Marketing: technical assistance for a study of
            grain marketing and formulation of action programs to
            improve pricing and marketing policies; (b) Land Policy:
            consultancy services to prepare a project to develop
            subdivided group farms; and support for data gathering
            activities of the Kenya Rangeland Ecological Monitoring Unit
            (KREMU); (c) Management and Budget: technical assistance to
            the MOA and MLD for improving management, financial
            management and budgeting, introducing microprocessors,
            supporting the activities of the Technical Assistance Pool,
            and training.
